settings.title: Inflamed Acne/Acne Scarring
settings.desc:
This beauty almost gave up when 
she didn't see immediate results. 
But, she trusted the process and 
stayed on course. Now, she glows 
with confidence.

settings.title: Inflamed/Non-Inflamed Acne
settings.desc:
This beauty had never experienced 
acne in her life and had no idea 
where to start. With the right 
products, and a little patience, 
she is loving her skin again!

settings.title: Non-Inflamed Acne
settings.desc:
This client hated the way her skin 
looked when she applied her make-up. 
She also didn't want to feel 
obligated to wear make-up 
everyday. Now, she's clear and 
officially make-up optional.

settings.title: Inflamed Acne/Acne Scarring
settings.desc:
This client was using african black 
soap on her face which caused
extreme dryness and made her
acne worse. With our products, we 
were able to rebalance her skin and 
get her back on her track. That smile 
is priceless!

settings.title: Inflamed/Non-Inflamed Acne
settings.desc:
Hello handsome! This client tried every 
product on the planet and nothing 
worked for him. He thought he would have 
to deal with acne for the rest of his life. 
I'm so glad I proved him wrong.

settings.title: Inflamed Acne/Acne Scarring
settings.desc:
When a client tells you that you changed 
their life, it literally changes your life. 
She has gone from feeling embarrassed 
and insecure to feeling beautiful and totally 
confident in her skin.

settings.title: Get to know Cheryl
settings.desc: Cheryl is a licensed esthetician and founder of Soulé Skincare Clinic in Woodland Hills, CA where she specializes in acne and ethnic skin. Cheryl became a licensed esthetician by the state of California in 2012. She then went on to advance her career by training at the world-renowned International Dermal Institute. With a passion for more knowledge, she attended the PCA Skin Academy and became certified in advanced chemical peel treatments. She's worked professionally with brands such as PCA Skin, Rhonda Allison, Image Skincare, Murad, DNA Health Institute, Viktoria Deann, and Dermaesthetics Beverly Hills just to name a few. Constantly setting new heights for herself, she went on to earn additional certifications in Cosmetic Ingredients, Acne, and Treating Multi-ethnic skin. After noticing a huge void in the industry for products and treatments safe for darker skin tones, she decided to bridge this gap by devoting her practice solely to ethnic skin and acne. Cheryl has been contributing editor to various skincare blogs and has written several articles related to skincare and ethnic skin in particular. Since 2014, Cheryl has personally cleared thousands of client’s faces and has received Raving Reviews. Her clinic was voted one of the top 4 facial salons in 2017 by Woodland Hills magazine. After 6 years of successfully treating acne clients at her clinic, Cheryl is excited to launch A.C.N.E. Solutions, where each product has been proven safe and effective for all grades of acne and all skin tones. Her products are now available without a prescription to acne warriors all across the U.S.

settings.main_title:
Confidence is the Most 
Beautiful Thing You Can Wear
settings.sub_title:
"My goal is to help you achieve clear skin, so you can live 
life healthy, happy, and blemish-free. My products are
 safe for all skin tones and will not clog your pores.
Simple. Clean. Effective."

Cheryl Cotton
Licensed Esthetician, Founder of A.C.N.E. Solutions

settings.title: We Love Happy Customers
settings.desc: "These products are life changing. I started using the products after watching my best friend go from really bad acne to gorgeous skin. She told me about ACNE Solutions, and I'm so glad she did. My skin has never looked better. Hey, when my husband complimented my skin, I knew for sure, it was working. I am hooked."

settings.title: We Love Happy Customers
settings.desc: "I struggled with acne and eczema for over 10 years. I tried everything on the market from proactive, accutane and bleaching cream and went to every dermatologist in the valley but nothing worked until I found Cheryl. I can't believe my acne is gone, my face is so clear and healthy! I couldn't be happier and more pleased with the results!"

settings.title: We Love Happy Customers
settings.desc: "For the first time in a long time, my skin looks and feels amazing! I was skeptical to try the products at first because my skin is extremely sensitive. Every time I try something new, my skin seems to break out worse. But, not this time. My skin is glowing. Thank you Cheryl."

settings.title: LIVE LIFE #CLEARSKINCONFIDENT
settings.description:
Let's stay connected on your journey. We have a lot to share and don't want you to miss a thing! 

JOIN OUR VIP EMAIL LIST AND GET 10% OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER

settings.sub_title:
Acne is a problem! That's why I created A.C.N.E. Solutions. I know what it is like to suffer from acne, and I know how incredibly frustrating it can be trying to find a solution that really works. Based on my own personal experience combined with 10 years of successfully treating acne in my Los Angeles clinic, I am proud to offer a skincare line that takes the guesswork out of getting clear. My products are clean, simple, and effective. 

Not sure where to start? Book a  consultation with me. I am devoted to helping you achieve the skin of your dreams.
